title: MAC problems
body:
Am I the only one with problems on mac?
I was trying to play a game with friends and my whole computer crashed twice 
I'm scared to try another because I don't want lpq

replies.body: If your pc is just crashing like that then you could be having some serious hardware issues.  First thing, clear out your vents and make sure you're not overheating otherwise your PC will shut off to protect itself.  If the issue persists, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and figure this out with you.  I hope that helps!
